Package reversi.game

Class Reversi

java.lang.Object
reversi.game.TwoPlayerGame
reversi.game.Reversi
public class Reversi extends TwoPlayerGame
Reversi class represents a two-player game of Reversi/Othello. It extends the TwoPlayerGame abstract class and implements its methods.

  • Field Summary
